segments.text: I'm looking at this whole scene, and it's full of impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage alone is going to be significant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets will be warped, and the floor could be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the danger of someone slipping on that massive puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine if the woman suddenly turns and steps into it without looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Or if the boy falls from the stool, landing in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes, perhaps even an injury, seem inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The childrenâ€™s innocent mischief could quickly turn serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like watching a slow-motion accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could intervene, just turn off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Or warn the woman about her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation makes me feel a bit helpless, just observing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame to see such a common kitchen turn into a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All because of a simple lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior of the house hides this growing domestic crisis.
segments.speaker: PAR
